content:
In my current project I see that we have a type definitions file for DSTU2 and we are using as types in our Angular project . PFA.
My requirement is have make my client code R4 compliant and I was trying to find the type definitions file for R4 but I could not find it. Can you please help me here . I have attached the DSTU2 type definitions file, similar file I am searching for R4 file. index.d.ts
